headline: US Stock Market Today: S&P 500 Futures Inch Higher amid Slower Global Inflation
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Friday, Dec, 12 2025 US stock futures are pointing slightly higher this morning, with S&P 500 contracts up around 0.1 percent as investors balance fresh central bank moves with cooling inflation abroad. The US 10 year Treasury yield is steady near 4.16 percent after the Federal Reserve cut interest rates by a quarter of a percentage point and signaled just one more cut next year, which keeps borrowing costs high but no longer climbing. At the same...

headline: Coinbase Sentiment Hits Rock Bottom as Bitcoin Correlation Crushes Options Traders
summary: Shares of Coinbase (NASDAQ:COIN) closed at $275.09 on December 10 as retail investor sentiment on Reddit remains deeply negative. The stock carries a sentiment score of just 17.2 out of 100, placing it in the “very bearish” category. Bitcoin’s 17.8% decline from its November peak of $107,482 to around $90,000 has dragged Coinbase down 36% ... Coinbase Sentiment Hits Rock Bottom as Bitcoin Correlation Crushes Options Traders

headline: Aetherflux seeks to launch data centers in space. CEO explains.
summary: Space-based solar energy company Aetherflux is planning the launch of its "Galactic Brain" project, which will see AI data center compute being performed from space, for the first quarter of 2027. Aetherflux aims to solve and address concerns around data center cooling and energy sourcing through this endeavor. Aetherflux founder and CEO Baiju Bhatt joins Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi to further discuss this initiative. Bhatt is the co-founder and former co-CEO of Robinhood Markets (HOOD). Also catch Yahoo Finance's interview with Reddit (RDDT) co-founder Alexis Ohanian, where the tech executive cites space-based data centers as the next innovation to come. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

content.title: Aetherflux seeks to launch data centers in space. CEO explains.
content.description:
Space-based solar energy company Aetherflux is planning the launch of its "Galactic Brain" project, which will see AI data center compute being performed from space, for the first quarter of 2027. Aetherflux aims to solve and address concerns around data center cooling and energy sourcing through this endeavor.

Aetherflux founder and CEO Baiju Bhatt joins Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi to further discuss this initiative.

Bhatt is the co-founder and former co-CEO of Robinhood Markets (HOOD).

Also catch Yahoo Finance's interview with Reddit (RDDT) co-founder Alexis Ohanian, where the tech executive cites space-based data centers as the next innovation to come.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Strategy, Bitcoin Slide Ahead Of Today's Defining Test
summary: Strategy shares slid along with the bitcoin price on Friday ahead of a possibly key announcement for the bitcoin-holding company late this afternoon.  The Nasdaq is set to reveal annual changes to the Nasdaq 100 index, whose performance is tracked by the Invesco QQQ Trust, which has over $400 billion invested.  The reconstitution of the index comes as MSCI considers whether to exclude companies whose primary business is acquiring bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies, which would mean ousting MSTR stock from its indices.

content.title: Strategy, Bitcoin Slide Ahead Of Today's Defining Test
content.summary: Strategy shares slid along with the bitcoin price on Friday ahead of a possibly key announcement for the bitcoin-holding company late this afternoon.  The Nasdaq is set to reveal annual changes to the Nasdaq 100 index, whose performance is tracked by the Invesco QQQ Trust, which has over $400 billion invested.  The reconstitution of the index comes as MSCI considers whether to exclude companies whose primary business is acquiring bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies, which would mean ousting MSTR stock from its indices.

headline: Carvana, Robinhood, Coinbase: The 3 biggest turnarounds from 2022
summary: Carvana (CVNA), Robinhood Markets (HOOD), and Coinbase Global (COIN) have two main themes in common as 2025 draws to a close: all three are the latest additions to the S&P 500 (^GSPC) this year, and they were the biggest market losers in 2022. Carvana will be joining the market index on Monday, December 22. Yahoo Finance senior markets reporter Ines Ferré outlines each of the three companies' most pivotal moments in their turnarounds from 2022 lows. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

content.title: Carvana, Robinhood, Coinbase: The 3 biggest turnarounds from 2022

Carvana will be joining the market index on Monday, December 22.

Yahoo Finance senior markets reporter Ines Ferré outlines each of the three companies' most pivotal moments in their turnarounds from 2022 lows.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Schwab, Robinhood Square Off as Brokerage Firms Prepare for ‘Great Wealth Transfer’
summary: Battle lines are being drawn in the brokerage industry. Charles Schwab, which pioneered the low-cost brokerage business in the 1970s, is now part of an establishment that leads with wealth management, investment advice and banking services.
